009package imagingbook.pub.color.image;
010
011import static imagingbook.lib.math.Arithmetic.max;
012import static imagingbook.lib.math.Arithmetic.min;
013
014/**
015 * Methods for converting between RGB and HLS color spaces.
016 * @author W. Burger
017 * @version 2021/09/24
018*/
019public class HlsConverter {
020        
021        public HlsConverter() { 
022        }
023
024        @Deprecated
025        public float[] RGBtoHLS (int[] RGB) {
026                return fromRGB(RGB);
027        }
028        
029        public float[] fromRGB (int[] RGB) {
030                final int R = RGB[0], G = RGB[1], B = RGB[2]; // R, G, B assumed to be in [0,255]
031                final int cHi = max(R, G, B);           // max. component value
032                final int cLo = min(R, G, B);           // min. component value
033                final int cRng = cHi - cLo;                     // component range
034                
035                // Calculate lightness L
036                float L = ((cHi + cLo) / 255f) / 2;
037                
038                // Calculate saturation S               
039                float S = 0;
040                if (0 < L && L < 1) {
041                        float d = (L <= 0.5f) ? L : (1 - L);
042                        S = 0.5f * (cRng / 255f) / d;
043                }
044                
045                // Calculate hue H (same as in HSV)
046                float H = 0;    
047                if (cHi > 0 && cRng > 0) {        // a color pixel
048                        float r = (float)(cHi - R) / cRng;
049                        float g = (float)(cHi - G) / cRng;
050                        float b = (float)(cHi - B) / cRng;
051                        float h;
052                        if (R == cHi)                      // R is largest component
053                                h = b - g;
054                        else if (G == cHi)                 // G is largest component
055                                h = r - b + 2.0f;
056                        else                               // B is largest component
057                                h = g - r + 4.0f;
058                        if (h < 0)
059                          h = h + 6;
060                        H = h / 6;
061                }
062                return new float[] {H, L, S};
063        }
064        
065        @Deprecated
066        public int[] HLStoRGB (float[] HLS) {
067                return toRGB(HLS);
068        }
069        
070        public int[] toRGB (float[] HLS) {
071                final float H = HLS[0], L = HLS[1], S = HLS[2]; // H,L,S in [0,1]
072                float r = 0, g = 0, b = 0;      
073                if (L <= 0)                             // black
074                        r = g = b = 0;
075                else if (L >= 1)                // white
076                        r = g = b = 1;
077                else {
078                        float hh = (6 * H) % 6;
079                        int   c1 = (int) hh;
080                        float c2 = hh - c1;
081                        float d = (L <= 0.5f) ? (S * L) : (S * (1 - L));
082                        float w = L + d;
083                        float x = L - d;
084                        float y = w - (w - x) * c2;
085                        float z = x + (w - x) * c2;
086                        switch (c1) {
087                                case 0: r = w; g = z; b = x; break;
088                                case 1: r = y; g = w; b = x; break;
089                                case 2: r = x; g = w; b = z; break;
090                                case 3: r = x; g = y; b = w; break;
091                                case 4: r = z; g = x; b = w; break;
092                                case 5: r = w; g = x; b = y; break;
093                        }                       
094                }       // r, g, b in [0,1]
095                int R = min(Math.round(r * 255), 255);
096                int G = min(Math.round(g * 255), 255);
097                int B = min(Math.round(b * 255), 255);
098                return new int[] {R, G, B};
099        }
100
